metadata.title: CVE-2019-10162 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A vulnerability has been found in PowerDNS Authoritative Server before versions 4.1.10, 4.0.8 allowing an authorized user to cause the server to exit by inserting a crafted record in a MASTER type zone under their control. The issue is due to the fact that the Authoritative Server will exit when it runs into a parsing error while looking up the NS/A/AAAA records it is about to use for an outgoing notify.

criterions.comment: pdns package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.6-3build1').
